result.eng: The price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.
result.ga: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go Corcaigh
result.orig: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go Corcaigh
result.html: An praghas a íoctar ar ábhar a sheoladh ó Bhaile Átha Cliath go CorcaighThe price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.
result.ponchtml: An praġas a íoctar ar áḃar a ẛeolaḋ ó Ḃaile Áṫa Cliaṫ go CorcaiġThe price paid for sending material from Dublin to Cork.

result.eng: Interest must be paid on any late payments.
result.ga: Caithfear ús a íoc ar aon íocaíocht atá deireanach
result.orig: Caithfear ús a íoc ar aon íocaíocht atá deireanach

result.ponchtml: Caiṫfear ús a íoc ar aon íocaíoċt atá deireanaċInterest must be paid on any late payments.

result.eng: Ten shillings an hour were paid to the teachers.
result.ga: Deich scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoirí
result.orig: Deich scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoirí
result.html: Deich scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoiríTen shillings an hour were paid to the teachers.
result.ponchtml: Deiċ scilling san uair a d'íoctaí do na múinteoiríTen shillings an hour were paid to the teachers.

result.html: D'íoc muid 300 euroWe paid 300 euro.
result.ponchtml: D'íoc muid 300 euroWe paid 300 euro.

result.html: D'íoc muid as an óstánWe paid for the hotel.

result.html: D'íoc mé 20 euro leoI paid them 20 euro.

result.html: D'íoc siad le seicThey paid with a check.

result.eng: They paid me for fixing it.
result.ga: D'íoc siad mé as é a dheisiú
result.orig: D'íoc siad mé as é a dheisiú
result.html: D'íoc siad mé as é a dheisiúThey paid me for fixing it.
result.ponchtml: D'íoc siad mé as é a ḋeisiúThey paid me for fixing it.

result.eng: He paid the rent to the landlord.
result.ga: D'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talún
result.orig: D'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talún
result.html: D'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talúnHe paid the rent to the landlord.
result.ponchtml: D'íoc sé an cíos leis an tiarna talúnHe paid the rent to the landlord.

result.eng: I almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ga: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé

result.html: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ponchtml: Is beag a ċeap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.

result.eng: When a loan is paid back regularly...

result.eng: I haven't paid road tax on that old car.
result.ga: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sin

result.eng: Big money is being paid to cultural schemes each year.

result.eng: During this employment no money was paid to herself.
